scripts.getModel: ask api get-model -s amzn1.ask.skill.d8ab4426-66ca-4dfd-bd0d-7f2c02419413 -g development -l en-US>models/en-US.json -p adminuser && ask api get-model -s amzn1.ask.skill.d8ab4426-66ca-4dfd-bd0d-7f2c02419413 -g development -l en-GB>models/en-GB.json -p adminuser && ask api get-model -s amzn1.ask.skill.d8ab4426-66ca-4dfd-bd0d-7f2c02419413 -g development -l en-IN>models/en-IN.json -p adminuser
scripts.uploadModelUS: ask api update-model -s amzn1.ask.skill.d8ab4426-66ca-4dfd-bd0d-7f2c02419413 --file models/en-US.json -l en-US --profile adminuser --stage development
scripts.uploadModelGB: ask api update-model -s amzn1.ask.skill.d8ab4426-66ca-4dfd-bd0d-7f2c02419413 --file models/en-GB.json -l en-GB --profile adminuser --stage development
scripts.uploadModelIN: ask api update-model -s amzn1.ask.skill.d8ab4426-66ca-4dfd-bd0d-7f2c02419413 --file models/en-IN.json -l en-IN --profile adminuser --stage development
scripts.uploadAllModel: npm run uploadModelUS && npm run uploadModelGB && npm run uploadModelIN
